content: Do we have the measure that is zero on all sets, just like we have MeasureTheory.Measure.dirac? If not, I'm happy to add it along with some basic API! (I'm asking because I want to show that convolution with the zero measure results in the zero measure, as a next addition to #9372.
That probably explains why it didn’t show up on my Moogle search. (Although it also was a bit of a stupid oversight of me that I didn’t just try 0…)
